content: shrimp it can be a shrimp ornament or a shrimp keychain bonus - a christmas hat is also included in the pattern shrimp can be made with or without the christmas hat **tools & materials** crochet hook i used clover 2 5mm 4/o hook use the hook size that matches your yarn yarn i used 60% cotton + 40% acrylic 4-ply size 2 sport weight yarn feel free to use the yarn of your choice * cream body * orange stripe * red blushes and christmas hat * white pom-pom and hat brim stuffing i used 100% polyester fiber filling feel free to use the stuffing of your choice yarn needle i used a round-tip yarn needle scissors anything you can cut the yarn with safety eyes i used a pair of 5mm safety eyes consider embroidering the eyes to eliminate any choking hazard stitch marker anything to mark the beginning of a round with have fun creating it check out my social media for more tips tutorials and free patterns like shrimp https //floecreation com or instagram @floecreation
